remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类与一些成员类，该类用于报表的事件数据，但两个类的用途不同。This class parallels some of the members class, which is used to report event data for , but the two classes serve different purposes. 是专门用于提供了类不公开为公共事件中的事件处理的重写[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。 is specifically used for overrides, which offers class handling for an event that is not exposed as a public event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For details, see .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个布尔参数，请注意，应将它们作为报告`true`仅当中值的更改都对呈现，或应解释这种情况下的值，如果读取现有的值。For the two Boolean parameters, note that you should report these as `true` only if the changes in the value are significant to rendering, or should interpret the values as such if reading existing values. 大小值的细微变化可由于精度的负面影响，尤其是当数学函数应用于双精度值。Minor changes in the size values are possible due to precision side-effects, particularly when mathematical functions are applied to the double values.
